text: Bad Timing is a 1980 film directed by Nicolas Roeg. It may also refer to: In music: * Bad Timing (album), by Jim O'Rourke, and the title song * Bad Timing and Other Stories, an EP by The Triffids, including the song "Bad Timing" * A song by Blue Rodeo from their album Five Days in July * A song by dEUS from their album Pocket Revolution In other uses: * "Bad Timing" (Farscape), the final episode of the Australian science fiction television series, Farscape * A novel in the Strontium Dog series by Rebecca Levene * "Bad Timing" (Adventure Time), an episode of the American animated television series, Adventure Time
title: Bad Timing (disambiguation)
